question:
Given a portion of a valid Java EE web application’s directory structure:
MyApp
| |– Directory1 | |– File1.html | |– META-INF | |– File2.html | |– WEB-INF |– File3.html You want to know whether File1.html, File2.html, and/or File3.html is protected from direct access by your web client’s browsers. What statement is true?

options.A: All three files are directly accessible.
options.E: Only File1.html and File2.html are directly accessible.
options.F: Only File1.html and File3.html are directly accessible.
options.G: Only File2.html and File3.html are directly accessible.
